languages.text: "Система Райкад, владения Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла — одного из моих коллег... и соперников. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} есть еще два Вольных Торговца, и каждый из них располагает ресурсами, сопоставимыми с моими. Быть может, ты когда-нибудь поспособствуешь тому, чтобы превзойти их обоих в богатстве и величии".

traits.locale_text: "Система Райкад, владения Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла — одного из моих коллег... и соперников. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} — всего три Вольных Торговца, и каждый из них располагает ресурсами, сопоставимыми с моими. Быть может, ты когда-нибудь поспособствуешь тому, чтобы превзойти их обоих в богатстве и величии".

languages.text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."
languages.original_text: "Система Райкад, владения Вольного Торговца Винтерскейла — одного из моих коллег... и соперников. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} есть еще два Вольных Торговца, и каждый из них располагает ресурсами, сопоставимыми с моими. Быть может, ты когда-нибудь поспособствуешь тому, чтобы превзойти их обоих в богатстве и величии".

traits.locale_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Only three Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

"The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Only three Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

"The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Only three Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

"The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Only three Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

languages.text: “前往莱卡德星系，行商浪人温特斯凯尔的领地。他是我的同行……也是我的对手。除了我之外，{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}还有另外两位行商浪人，他们的资源与财富都与我不相上下。或许有朝一日，你会协助冯·瓦兰修斯家族超越另外两位行商浪人，让家族变得更加富庶，更加辉煌。”
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: “前往莱卡德星系，行商浪人温特斯凯尔的领地。他是我的同行……也是我的对手。整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}只有三位行商浪人，另外两个人的资源与财富都与我不相上下。或许有朝一日，你会协助冯·瓦兰修斯家族超越另外两位行商浪人，让家族变得更加富庶，更加辉煌。”

languages.text: «Al sistema Rykad, dominio del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale, es uno de mis iguales... y de mis rivales. Aparte de mí, hay dos Comerciantes Independientes activos en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, y cada uno de ellos posee recursos comparables a los míos. Tal vez algún día puedas ayudar a la casa von Valancius a superar a ambos en riqueza y esplendor».
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: «Al sistema Rykad, dominio del Comerciante Independiente Winterscale, es uno de mis iguales... y de mis rivales. Solo hay tres Comerciantes Independientes activos en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, y cada uno de ellos posee recursos comparables a los míos. Tal vez algún día puedas ayudar a la casa von Valancius a superar a ambos en riqueza y esplendor».

languages.text: 「ライカド星系、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの領域、私の仲間の一人…そしてライバルたち。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に存在する自由開拓者は私の他に2人だけで、彼らはそれぞれ私と同等のリソースを持っている。きっとあなたはいつかフォン・ヴァランシウス家が富と栄華において、他の2人のどちらをも超えるのに貢献してくれることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: 「リカッド・システム、ローグトレーダーウィンタースケールの領域、私の仲間の一人…そしてライバルたち。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に存在するローグトレーダーは3人だけで、彼らはそれぞれ私と同等のリソースを持っています。おそらくあなたはいつかフォン・ヴァランシウス家が富と栄華において、他の2人のどちらをも超えるのを手伝うことになるでしょう」
「ライカド星系、自由開拓者ウィンタースケールの領域、私の仲間の一人…そしてライバルたち。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に存在する自由開拓者は私の他に2人だけで、彼らはそれぞれ私と同等のリソースを持っている。きっとあなたはいつかフォン・ヴァランシウス家が富と栄華において、他の2人のどちらをも超えるのに貢献してくれることでしょう」

languages.text: « Dans le système de Rykad, le domaine du libre-marchand Winterscale, un de mes confrères... et rivaux. À part moi, il n'y a que deux autres libres-marchands dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, et chacun possède des ressources comparables aux miennes. Un jour, peut-être aiderez-vous la maison von Valancius à les surpasser tous deux en matière de richesse et de splendeur. »
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: « Dans le système de Rykad, le domaine du libre-marchand Winterscale, un de mes confrères... et rivaux. Il n'y a que trois libres-marchands dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, et chacun possède des ressources comparables aux miennes. Un jour, peut-être aiderez-vous la maison von Valancius à les surpasse tous deux en matière de richesse et de splendeur. »

languages.text: "Zum Rykad-System, dem Reich von Freihändler Winterzunder, einem meiner Kollegen ... und Rivalen. Neben mir gibt es in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} nur zwei weitere Freihändler, und beide verfügen über Ressourcen, die mit den meinen vergleichbar sind. Vielleicht werdet Ihr eines Tages dem Haus von Valancius behilflich sein, beide an Wohlstand und Pracht zu übertrumpfen."
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: "Zum Rykad-System, dem Reich von Freihändler Winterzunder, einem meiner Kollegen ... und Rivalen. Es gibt in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} nur drei Freihändler, und alle verfügen über Ressourcen, die mit meinen vergleichbar sind. Vielleicht werdet Ihr eines Tages dem Haus von Valancius behilflich sein, beide an Wohlstand und Pracht zu übertrumpfen."

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi'ne. Akranlarımdan ve rakiplerimden biri olan Hür Tacir Winterscale'ın mıntıkası. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} varlığını sürdüren benden başka iki Hür Tacir var ve üçümüzün kaynakları da birbiriyle yarışacak boyutta. Belki bir gün von Valancius Hanesi'ne servet ve ihtişamda diğer ikisini geride bırakmaya yardım edersin."
languages.original_text: "The Rykad System, the domain of Rogue Trader Winterscale, one of my peers... and rivals. Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Sistemi'ne. Akranlarımdan ve rakiplerimden biri olan Hür Tacir Winterscale'ın mıntıkası. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} varlığını sürdüren benden başka iki Hür Tacir var ve üçümüzün kaynakları da birbiriyle yarışacak boyutta. Belki bir gün von Valancius Hanesi'ne servet ve ihtişamda diğer ikisini geride bırakmaya yardım edersin."

Besides me, two other Rogue Traders exist in the Koronus Expanse, and each of them possesses resources comparable to mine. Perhaps you will one day assist House von Valancius in surpassing both of them in affluence and splendour."
